page.title: 19FARRAR FARM,EAST FARNDON
page.content: Farrar Farm,East Farndon is owned by Mr.West.He has{186 acres}of land and he uses 67 acres for grazing,2 for barns and the rest for crops.He owns 123 sheep,25 bullocks and 4 five month old heifers which will eventually be sold for beef.He has 15 calves as replacements. Of the total acreage, 25 is oil seed rape,48 is winter barley,46 is winter wheat and there is no cultivated grass. He hires no machines as he owns a combine harvester, bailer, corndrill, mower, some harrows and sprayers. Each year he uses 1,000 gallons of diesel. Fertilizer costs Â£250 an acre.Animals cost Â£75 each to buy and Â£20 to graze. He keeps 3 sheep or 1 bull per acre. He works 11 hours a day normally but 16 hours at harvesting time or 24 at lambing time.
